data.description:
Meet, chat, watch content, and share your photos with real people from around the globe with vTime XR - the world's first cross-reality social network.
 
Completely cross-platform, vTime XR makes it possible to socialize with friends from anywhere in the world, inside stunning virtual destinations or your own 360 photos.

User feedback: 
“I would say vTime is definitely the most presence inducing app available right now” 
“One of the most incredible apps for VR” 

• Meet, chat and share in amazing VR destinations
• Watch exciting video content with friends in vTime XR Theaters
• Share photos, or sit with friends inside 360 images
• Experience lifelike 360 sound with DTS:X® Game Audio
• Express yourself with virtual gestures 
• Private message vTime friends with vText
• Millions of customization options
• Users in over 190 countries

*NOT COMPATIBLE WITH BLUETOOTH HEADSETS. PLEASE USE WIRED EARBUDS/HEADPHONES*

*AR MODE NOT AVAILABLE FOR GEAR VR OR GO

changelog.change_log: Version 2.12.1261, build 1261, revision ad349c6f8cf3605fb43911fae1d6ce991760614b
Version 2.11.793, build 793, revision 8e551b03da35d49dd0df39266016c6d30d6f633f
Version 2.11.749, build 749, revision b25fa1ce1a7343f4ca9dc41c867c5e05cd3ed1cf

• The vTime XR universe is about to get a whole lot bigger (again)! After speaking to the community, we’re making a change to our destinations menu. Over the next few months, two locations will arrive in vTime every week until our destinations menu is fit to bursting. There’ll also be a few surprises along the way…

• Controller update: Following feedback from our users, we've changed the way you use the controller to interact with our menus. From today, use the trigger to select and use the touchpad to point.   

• Bug fixes and improvements
Version 2.10.2, build 2860, revision 34804
Version 2.10.2, build 2815, revision 34804
Version 2.10.2, build 2793, revision 34559

vTime has evolved into vTime XR – the world’s first cross-reality social experience.

 

• Now supporting new realities: vTime XR is cross platform and now cross-reality! Our latest update makes it possible to chat seamlessly with friends who are using AR Mode on Android and iOS devices.

• Improved Boardroom audio

• Other bug fixes and improvements

• Next-generation 360 sound comes to vTime powered by DTS:X® Game Audio. Join Mr. Vee in the Magic Show now to experience astounding sounding immersive effects!

• New look destinations menu

• Users can now block and mute others immediately after joining

• Scrolling ‘About Me’ text

• Larger default keyboard

• Eyebrow color no longer resets after hair color change

• Users on slow internet connections no longer kicked from sessions

• Improved voice comms

• Avatar bubbles show the correct image on the Connections Screen
Fixes an issue in which some users were stuck in a permissions loop during start up.
Audio and performance bug fixes and improvements

* The Study: Overlooked by famous British landmark Big Ben, vTime’s newest destination is inspired by Sherlock Holmes’ Baker Street address and Sigmund Freud’s consulting room. Update now to experience!
 * Regularly changing choice of destinations: Our new compact destinations menu will see us mixing up the destinations on offer, adding in old favorites and introducing new and seasonal ones frequently.

* Bug fixes and improvements
Version 2.9.6, build 1867, revision 26280
Version 2.9.6, build 1855, revision 25939

- Optional destinations: All destinations are now available on-demand, meaning vTime can take up much less space on your hard drive. We’ll hold the recently used destinations on your computer for instant loading. Alternatively, permanently download as many destinations as you’d like to use vTime as normal. 
- Background downloads: Continue to use vTime whenever extra data downloads.
- User bio added to in-app profile
- Add a vText to a friend request 
- Bug fixes and optimizations
Version 2.9.1, build 1412, revision 20733

- Optional destinations: All destinations are now available on-demand, meaning vTime can take up much less space on your device. We’ll hold the recently used destinations on your phone for instant loading. Alternatively, permanently download as many destinations as you’d like to use vTime as normal. 
- Background downloads: Continue to use vTime while extra data downloads.
- User bio added to in-app profile
- Add a vText to a friend request 
- Bug fixes and optimizations

- New spring clothing pack
- Personal Shield: Released alongside Rift Touch controller support, the personal shield prevents Rift users from touching your avatar, or invading your space with their hands. The shield is on by default, and you can choose whether to allow your friends access to your inner-circle.  
- Get closer to your friends in improved destinations On the Edge, Around the Cave Fire, Executive Jet, and Terrace De L’Amour. 
- Improved ‘Busy’ state now blocks incoming friend requests. Find unseen requests in the Pending tab. 
- Bug fixes and optimizations.

- New spring clothing pack
- Personal Shield: Released alongside Rift Touch controller support, the personal shield prevents Rift users from touching your avatar, or invading your space with their hands. The shield is on by default, and you can choose whether to allow your friends access to your inner-circle.  
- Get closer to your friends in improved destinations On the Edge, Around the Cave Fire, Executive Jet, and Terrace De L’Amour. 
- Improved ‘Busy’ state now blocks incoming friend requests. Find unseen requests in the Pending tab. 
- Bug fixes and optimizations.

- Relax, recharge, and be mindful in new destination, The Retreat. Our tranquil Japanese blossom garden awaits…
- vMotes – now with touchpad support: Add an extra level of social connectivity with our suite of virtual emojis - accessible through the touchpad or Gear VR Controller. Use in conversation to convey excitement, fun, and surprise through new gestures.
- Touchpad support for the Mini-Menu: Giving quick access to user actions such as ‘Add Friend’ and ‘vText’, use the touchpad or Gear VR controller to activate. 
- Bug fixes and improvements
